name: Magic & Mayhem: The Art of Magic
name_original: Magic & Mayhem: The Art of Magic
description:
Magic & Mayhem: The Art of Magic is a strategy game developed by Climax Entertainment and Charybdis. It was originally released in 2001. Virgin Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Magic & Mayhem: The Art of Magic is available on PC.
